title: AES Encrypted Directory
description:
Provides an encryption solution for Lucene indexes, using the AES encryption algorithm.
You must have the JCE Unlimited Strength Jurisdiction Policy Files 6 Release Candidate which
you can get from java.sun.com.

comments.content:
This looks cool!

Can you change the .tar.gz file into a patch?  EG see here: http://wiki.apache.org/lucene-java/HowToContribute.

I think a good place for AESDirectory to live is in contrib/misc?
comments.author: Michael McCandless
